alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:58AM EST until February 08 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Windham Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The precipitation may start as a mix of snow and rain, which will then transition to some sleet mixing with freezing rain before tapering off as patchy freezing drizzle or plain drizzle towards midnight. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. &&
